name: Degirmenci Konak

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We arrived at Safranbolu around midnight due to heavy snow along the way from Istanbul. The owner Servet was sleeping downstairs waiting for us. The room had a tasteful decoration, and I especially like the feel of the linen.The next morning, we got up and found the nice assortment of dishes at our breakfast table, and Servet showed us around the house telling us stories about her family. The decoration of the house was very stylish and the collection of her and her children very impressive. She herself was very lovely, a bit childish and a good painter and sentimental singer too :) We really enjoyed her company.
reviews.title: Loved it so much!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: She and her friend took us to her friend's restaurant for the dinner. The dinner was ample and super delicious, (even the bread was very nice), and at a reasonable price.
reviews.title: excellent and humanizm

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I personally liked Safranbolu very much, the old and stylish architecture, the streets, the nice people, it's a bit pity that it was very very cold during our stay. Will come back during spring when flowers are blossoming. :)
reviews.title: A pleasant trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: a traditional concept, the traditional fretless, more importantly, a communication, the duo met and the family ce uğurlanıyor guests. Is there an example of this when I do not know but I'm an old customer to (1 more time for my accommodation) 2.kez able to meet the winter because the road was I or 2, but this Safranbolu I chose to stay and I know once again on the way to say no, Have you received wages in the pre-accommodation of this family cowered inside, unless the traditional dialogue, intimate boutique really appeal to the understanding of the soul
reviews.title: Deserves its number one spot

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: love, good luck. to keep reminding us feeling as old as the oldest places
reviews.title: Two days in an Ottoman world

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I share the views of most fellow reviewers which I am not going to repeat here. Would like to thank the very kind lady owner again for the wonderful stay. There are two things I may wish to bring to future visitors' notice: 1. if you are taking long-distance bus to Safranbolu, just take a taxi direct from Safranbolu Octagor to this house. The fare should be no more than 15TL by meter and it saves you a lot of time finding the place. Free dolmus provided by bus companies will not drop you there. You will waste time orientating. 2. Walk to town centre is okay, downhill and takes around 15 minutes in leisure. The return however is not that easy. You may get lost if you are not careful as you will find that all houses look the same. My suggestion is actually to take a taxi (10TL fixed price) to save the hassle.
reviews.title: Exceptional host in a beautiful mansion

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: It is in very quite location and interior design is an original Safranbolu mansion. Garden is good for relaxing. Mrs. Servet insists on a certain quality and cleanliness. We spend very good time in hotel and city during our visit. Our 8 months old baby was also comfortable there.
reviews.title: quite, comfortable and great hospitality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Camera collection is exceptional :)
reviews.title: Stayed here for my honeymoon

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I've stayed in Degirmenci Konak for 2 days during my honeymoon. The place is very nice, orientally decorated and smells lots of history. There's an interesting showcase of old cameras just in the entrance.
reviews.title: Great place, great hospitality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff is great. They treat you not like a customer, but a member of the family. So you'll certainly feel like home here.
reviews.title: Definitely one more time

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were very sorry that we had only allowed one night in Safranbolu at the amazing Degirmenci Konak. The building itsself is truly beautiful and the hosts Ahmet and his wife were the friendliest and most welcoming that we encountered duruing our 5 week stay in Turkey. The house is a short interesting walk from the old town and we realise tha it is very very easy to return by dolumus. Ahmet explained the history of the house and its renovation and showed us some amazing photogarphs of the surrounding area that we alas did not have time to visit. The restaurant that he recommended was also a highlight os our trip. On our return from dinner, we had tea and freshly made cake whilst sitting in bean bags in the lovely garden, looking at the clear clear stars and breakfast the next morning was just as delicious. Because we had to catch a bus Ahmet kindly offerred to drive us to the the otogar but, before he did so he took us on tour of the town and showed us all of the interesting sites that we did not have time to visit. Next year we are planning to return to Tutkey and Safranbolu and the Degirmenci Konak are on the top of the list and this time for more than one night. Thankyou so much for your kindness
reviews.title: One night not enough

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Değirmenci Konak was absolutely fantastic. We have just come back from two days trip from Safranbolu and we had wonderful time. Değirmenci Konak was one of a kind and everybody was so polite and helpful with the city tour; Where to eat, what to see, and how to use the time as efficient as we can. We stayed at a room called "Taş oda" (room made of stones) was amazing. This was a unique room we have never seen before in our lifetime. We would like to thank Mrs. Servet and his son Ahmet for this great time we had there and their hospitality.
reviews.title: Wanna be at Safranbolu now...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: p.s. This was our first anniversary and Mr. Ahmet took great number of nice pictures. Thanks again.
reviews.title: Friendly and helpful hosts in an interesting historic town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: See you on our next anniversary...
reviews.title: Like visiting family....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: İpek & Mete Alak
reviews.title: Super host

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have no way of making any comparison on this first trip to Safranbolu but, Degirmenci Konak is definitely what I had in mind when I made my reservation for a two-day trip. It is a hidden gem (you need telephone guidance and directions from Servet hanim or Isik family to find your home away from home!). Degirmenci Konak is very clean, serving fantastic breakfast and the building itself is an old greek mansion renovated superbly to its former glory! We are looking forward to our next trip to discover more and see our new friend (Servet hanim, Ahmet, Hulya, Yasemin and Deco, the kitten) in Safranbolu.
reviews.title: My First Trip to Safranbolu

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nusret & Belgin
reviews.title: Unforgettable refreshing experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Staying in this authentic Ottoman house is an unforgettable refreshing experience for us. The house is charming and beautifully decorated. Our room is big with a wonderful view of the garden and the valley. Every morning we woke up and heard the birds singing and the gentle muslim prayer chant. A great way to start a day!
reviews.title: Careful attention to architectural detail. Wonderful atmosphere

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: Breakfast is served in a perfect garden setting. The garden is just as attractive as the house itself. Every time we came back from a walk, we loved laying in bean bag chairs in the garden and relaxed.
reviews.title: Certainly lives up to its reputation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Servet, the owner of this family hotel, made us feel really at home. She always smiled cheerfully and was attentive to our needs. Her English was limited but she was enthusiastic in communicating with us. So there was no big problem.
reviews.title: Wonderful Hotel, wonderful welcome.

description: Reconstructed as a 165 year old historic mansion, Degirmenci Konak Hotel is a distinctive small hotel. Nestling in the heart of Safranbolu, Karabuk, with magnificent views of the town and surrounding nature, the Degirmenci Konak is a stylish hotel with just seven guest rooms. Elegantly decorated with antiques, rooms have been designed for your utmost comfort with luxuries beds draped with fine cotton linens and fluffy towels, as well as seamlessly integrated modern facilities. Come and join with us to share a wonderful experience!
